about.heading: About AbuSwe7l
about.bio1: AbuSwe7l is a professional streamer and content creator from Saudi Arabia. Known for his passion and community spirit, he's one of the region's top streamers.
about.bio2: As a member of Clan Power, he participates in top-tier tournaments and collaborations, sharing epic moments with fans around the world.

cards.title: Clan Power
cards.text: Proud member of the elite gaming group, participating in global events.

cards.title: Saudi Arabia
cards.text: Representing the emerging gaming community in the Middle East.

streams.heading: Watch Live
streams.subtitle: Catch AbuSwe7l's latest streams and videos across different platforms. Join the community and never miss a moment of action!

about.title: About the Team
about.text: The admin team is the heart of the AbuSwe7l channel. They work day and night to ensure every viewer enjoys a safe and exciting experience. With a range of skills and expertise, the team keeps everything running smoothly and efficiently.

contact.title: Contacting the Admins
contact.intro: Need to reach out? You can contact the team through the following:
items: Message moderators directly in the live stream chat
Connect on the official Discord server
Send a message through any of our social media platforms

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: This page outlines the terms and conditions for watching and participating in AbuSwe7l's channel and events. Please read carefully and follow these rules to ensure a positive experience for everyone.
terms.notice: Participating in the stream means you automatically agree to these terms.

general.title: General Conduct Rules
items: Respect all viewers, moderators, and the channel owner.
Avoid offensive or inappropriate language in the chat.
Do not share inappropriate content or unauthorized external links.
Stay on topic according to the stream‚Äôs content.
Respect others‚Äô privacy and never ask for personal information.

events.title: Event & Contest Participation
events.text: All followers are welcome to join contests and events as long as they meet the specific terms of each event. Prizes will only be awarded to those who follow the rules.

discipline.title: Disciplinary Actions
discipline.text: Moderators may take action against users who violate the rules, including:
items: Temporary mute or suspension from chat.
Permanent bans for repeated or serious violations.

ip.title: Intellectual Property Rights
ip.text: All content shared in the stream belongs to AbuSwe7l and may not be reused or distributed without permission.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.text: AbuSwe7l reserves the right to update these terms at any time. Changes will be announced publicly and take effect immediately upon posting.

contact.heading: Contact & Support
contact.text: If you have any questions or concerns about these terms, feel free to contact a moderator or reach out via social media.

footer.description: Professional streamer and content creator, representing Clan Power. Broadcasting from Saudi Arabia to the world.
